div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 11:15 am CDT

td.span: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly sunny, with a high near 91. South wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
Patchy fog after 1am. Otherwise, mostly cloudy, with a low around 69. Southeast wind 5 to 9 mph becoming light south southwest after midnight.
Sunny, with a high near 94. North northeast wind 6 to 13 mph.
